item.title: Deploy NGINX container using Terraform
item.description: Terraform works based on a configuration file, in this case config.tf. The configuration defines your infrastructure, in this instance as providers and resources. A provider is an abstract way of handling the underlying infrastructure and responsible for managing the lifecycle of a resource.
